change.item: This finding aid was manually revised and updated to EAD 2.0 specifications by Sara Filion
This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Various portions of unpublished manuscript in original and carbon typescript and photocopy; relating to Arizona history from early history to the 20th century. In addition to general history, includes chapters on Mormon colonization, Native Americans, local history of cities and towns, and pioneers. Contains index.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: History of Arizona (AZ 194). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Pioneer merchant, bookkeeper, and amateur historian; Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Various portions of unpublished manuscript in original and carbon typescript and photocopy; relating to Arizona history from early history to the 20th century. In addition to general history, includes chapters on Mormon colonization, Native Americans, local history of cities and towns, and pioneers. Contains index.
